topic.title: How to earn bitcoins?
topic.body: I'd like to know what kind of services are in need for people who have bitcoins? I have a few things in my mind, but the fact is, I have no clue. Can anyone give me an advice ?

1_19jY7u41PdsoRuWKac3bU78SCsDVZFGucd.body: I think it would be better to find another way around, for example, keeping the size of the inbox below 10MB can be achieved by archiving old mails, or using ipfs or something like that, I'm sure there will be a perfect solution for this, but for now, IMHO, the architecture is not capable doing that (forcing people to host big things, just because they have spare disk space, or not use the service)

1_1JYAaUBXsh3DrN8UZHz4suAUVXzV3X15QL.body: The solution is depends on who do you want to hide from. If it's your your firm, or you just want to add a layer of security to the wifi link, or if you're afraid of rogue ISP employees spying on your traffic, then VPN is just fine.
